channel.title: [317] Damn Black Screen [317]
channel.description:
[size=15pt][b]I'm willing to give +10 rep to anyone who helps me throughout this problem. If you use teamviewer, then ask me for my ID and Pass.[/b][/size]
Hi guys. Ok so I just got started on working on my webclient for my currently-being-developed server, UsmanIsland. But then there is ALWAYS a problem.... When I log from the webclient into the game, it loggs in and gives me a black screen. I get so happy that it's finally loading, but after 3 seconds, it loggs me out.
This doesn't happen when I login from the client. All is successful when I login from the client, but not the webclient. Please help! Lots of people wouldn't want to download the client to play.
Thanks, Usman

item.title: [317] Damn Black Screen [317]
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[size=15pt]I’m willing to give +10 rep to anyone who helps me throughout this problem. If you use teamviewer, then ask me for my ID and Pass.[/size]

Hi guys. Ok so I just got started on working on my webclient for my currently-being-developed server, UsmanIsland.
But then there is ALWAYS a problem… When I log from the webclient into the game, it loggs in and gives me a black screen. I get so happy that it’s finally loading, but after 3 seconds, it loggs me out.

This doesn’t happen when I login from the client. All is successful when I login from the client, but not the webclient.
Please help! Lots of people wouldn’t want to download the client to play.

Thanks,
Usman
